effect.ruby_sapphire: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

effect.xd: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.emerald: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.xd: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Takes one half the damage inflicted on a sleeping foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Takes one half the damage inflicted on a sleeping foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Absorbs half the damage it inflicted on a sleeping foe to restore HP.
